StratmasClient
Class ProcessVariableDescription

java.lang.Object
  StratmasClient.ProcessVariableDescription

public class ProcessVariableDescription
extends Object

Class that represents a description of a process variable.

Creates new process variable description.

Parameters:
name - name of the process variable.
fac - true if factions exist for this variable, otherwise false.
min - minmimum value.
max - maximum value.
